Title: Relates to the point of contact for conducting national instant criminal background checks
Summary: Relates to the point of contact for conducting national instant criminal background checks; authorizes and directs the division of state police to serve as the point of contact for implementation of 18 U.S.C. sec. 922(t); establishes the background check fund.
LawCode: Add §228, Exec L; amd §§896 & 898, Gen Bus L; amd §400.03, add §400.06, Pen L; add §99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the general business law and the penal law, in relation to the point of contact for conducting national instant criminal background checks; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to the creation of the background check fund
